name: Sweet Charm of Cream Cakes Match 3 Free Game
name_original: Sweet Charm of Cream Cakes Match 3 Free Game
description:
Do you love matching games!? How about adding a twist and Have much more fun ?

with no purchases everything is FREEE

Match the cream cakes, cross them, line them up, connect them and make a threesome.

Tap them, move them and get rid of them all! Come on in and try this multi-level matching game that you will be addicted too!

Immerse yourself in the magical world of cream jelly cakes Match 3, an exciting game full of delicious candies and jellybeans with fun levels and figures. Follow the candy path and discover new delicious scenarios. Match 3 or more sweets and have fun playing!

** ABOUT THE GAME **

-Match 3 or More Equal sweet cream cakes .
-Get the Maximum Points in a Limited Number of Moves.
-Different Difficulty Levels.
-Delicious Candies, Sugar cubes and sweet cream cakes .
-Destroy Ice Blocks.
-Cute and Colorful Candy Graphics
-Fun & Easy to play. You just have to match candies!
-The Game will offer Hints to Help you Doing some Movements .
-Magical Sounds
-All Levels and Game Modes are FREE
-Tons of Levels for Endless Gameplay!


**POWER UPS**

-Match 4 Equal Cream cakes and You Will Create Sweet Bombs that will explode and will help you getting more points.
-Match 5 Equal Cream cakes and You Will Create a Special Gummy that will remove all the sweets in the same column and row.
-Match 6 Equal Cream cakes and you will create a Beam-candy to destroy all candies of the same color.

**Cream cakes STORE**
Earn coins to have more extra moves and advantages in the game. When you're locked in a screen, you can use these coins to help you move forward for FREEEEE You don't buy anything

-Extra moves: Add more moves when you need it
-Cut Boosters: Remove any berry for one touch
-Free Bombs: Add bombs on field
-Free Switch: Switch two berries for free
-Shake: Mix all berries on field
-Magic Finger:Turn berries into bombs

Sweeten your free time and have fun with Cream cakes match 3!
